publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1212 Aileen Campbell: Townhead Cafe in Biggar Wins UK Award—That the Parliament congratulates Biggar’s Townhead Cafe for winning the finals of the UK Fish and Chip Shop of the Year competition; notes that the last time a Scottish champion won the award was 10 years ago; further notes that, for the first time in the competition’s history, entrants were judged on their commitment to building a sustainable future for the industry, and congratulates owners Sandra and Gordon Hillan for their accomplishment and wishes them every success in the future.

S3M-1212 Aileen Campbell: Townhead Cafe in Biggar Wins UK Award—That the Parliament congratulates Biggar’s Townhead Cafe for winning the finals of the UK Fish and Chip Shop of the Year competition; notes that the last time a Scottish champion won the award was 10 years ago; further notes that, for the first time in the competition’s history, entrants were judged on their commitment to building a sustainable future for the industry, and congratulates owners Sandra and Gordon Hillan for their accomplishment and wishes them every success in the future. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Karen Gillon*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, John Park*, Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, John Lamont*, Bashir Ahmad*
S3M-1212 Townhead Cafe in Biggar Wins UK Award (lodged on 24 January 2008) Christine Grahame*
S3M-1212 Townhead Cafe in Biggar Wins UK Award (lodged on 24 January 2008) Alex Neil*
S3M-1212 Townhead Cafe in Biggar Wins UK Award (lodged on 24 January 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1212 Townhead Cafe in Biggar Wins UK Award (lodged on 24 January 2008) Gil Paterson*
